name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brave Browser for PC version - New Tab BG

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brave Browser for PC Extention provides you customized background to your new tab For Brave Browser lovers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brave Browser for PC, Windows, and Mac chrome Extension can easily change your New chrome Tab Color and New tab background.
You can easily change your New Tab Color by using this Brave Browser for pc New Tab Chrome extension.
 
It's simple and replaces your current Chrome New Tab window with Brave Browser For PC, Windows, and Mac - New Tab Chrome Extension. This chrome extension only developed for Brave Browser users FAN.
